result.eng: They were using Irish as a secret language.
result.ga: Bhí an Ghaeilge á húsáid acu mar theanga rúnda
result.orig: Bhí an Ghaeilge á húsáid acu mar theanga rúnda
result.html: Bhí an Ghaeilge á húsáid acu mar theanga rúndaThey were using Irish as a secret language.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an Ġaeilge á húsáid acu mar ṫeanga rúndaThey were using Irish as a secret language.

result.eng: The secret service is operating in many countries.
result.ga: Tá an tseirbhís rúnda ag gníomhú in an-chuid tíortha
result.orig: Tá an tseirbhís rúnda ag gníomhú in an-chuid tíortha
result.html: Tá an tseirbhís rúnda ag gníomhú in an-chuid tíorthaThe secret service is operating in many countries.
result.ponchtml: Tá an tseirḃís rúnda ag gníoṁú in an-ċuid tíorṫaThe secret service is operating in many countries.

result.eng: The question that bothers the American secret services most is, where are the Russian spies?
result.ga: An cheist is mó atá ag déanamh scime do sheirbhísí rúnda Mheiriceá ná cá bhfuil na spiairí Rúiseacha
result.orig: An cheist is mó atá ag déanamh scime do sheirbhísí rúnda Mheiriceá ná cá bhfuil na spiairí Rúiseacha
result.html: An cheist is mó atá ag déanamh scime do sheirbhísí rúnda Mheiriceá ná cá bhfuil na spiairí RúiseachaThe question that bothers the American secret services most is, where are the Russian spies?
result.ponchtml: An ċeist is mó atá ag déanaṁ scime do ẛeirḃísí rúnda Ṁeiriceá ná cá ḃfuil na spiairí RúiseaċaThe question that bothers the American secret services most is, where are the Russian spies?

result.eng: It seemed that even more airplanes in American skies were targeting secret targets.
result.ga: Ba chosúil go raibh níos mó eitleáin i spéartha Mheiriceá ag díriú ar spriocanna rúnda
result.orig: Ba chosúil go raibh níos mó eitleáin i spéartha Mheiriceá ag díriú ar spriocanna rúnda
result.html: Ba chosúil go raibh níos mó eitleáin i spéartha Mheiriceá ag díriú ar spriocanna rúndaIt seemed that even more airplanes in American skies were targeting secret targets.
result.ponchtml: Ba ċosúil go raiḃ níos mó eitleáin i spéarṫa Ṁeiriceá ag díriú ar spriocanna rúndaIt seemed that even more airplanes in American skies were targeting secret targets.
